conbody.p: Toggle the SNAPISOPAIR system variable to specify the drafting plane for isometric drawings. You can launch this command at the Command prompt or within another command by preceding it with an apostrophe: 'ISOPLANE.

ul.li: Left: sets the SNAPISOPAIR system variable to Left.
Right: sets the SNAPISOPAIR system variable to Right.
Top: sets the SNAPISOPAIR system variable to Top.
Toggle: changes the SNAPISOPAIR system variable to the next setting. It cycles in order from the current setting (left-top-right-left).
